memberdef.name: LogisticRegressionTestData

briefdescription.para: Create the data for the a logistic regression test.

parameterdescription.para: Matrix object to store the data into.
Matrix object to store the test data into.
Matrix object to store the shuffled data into.

detaileddescription.para: Marcus Edel This file provides some useful test function methods.
